content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill (position not specified) and a stone furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5)
Consists of 
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0)
- Steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)

### Transport system at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of 
- Transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5)
- Transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities without fuel
- Ensure that burner entities have fuel before using them.
### Errors when using entities without ingredients
- Ensure that entities have the required ingredients before using them.
### Errors when using steam engine without connection
- Ensure that the steam engine is connected to a power network before using it.
### Errors when using pipe groups without input
- Ensure that pipe groups have input before using them.
### Errors when using electricity groups without being plugged into an electric network
- Ensure that electricity groups are plugged into an electric network before using them.
### Errors when using belt groups without input
- Ensure that belt groups have input before using them.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent. 
No important variables have been assigned.
